aaad6613-1159-42ee-a596-a54bd461426e.title: Dune
aaad6613-1159-42ee-a596-a54bd461426e.author: Frank Herbert
aaad6613-1159-42ee-a596-a54bd461426e.description: Set in the distant future amidst a huge interstellar empire, Dune tells the story of young Paul Atreides as he navigates political intrigue and battles for control of the desert planet Arrakis.

b5dcdecf-ae2b-4358-b873-2d67ad2fac52.title: Ender's Game
b5dcdecf-ae2b-4358-b873-2d67ad2fac52.author: Orson Scott Card
b5dcdecf-ae2b-4358-b873-2d67ad2fac52.description: A young boy, Ender Wiggin, is recruited into a military academy to prepare for an impending alien invasion.

9cdc008b-d86e-414e-a2cc-4226499e0acb.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
9cdc008b-d86e-414e-a2cc-4226499e0acb.author: Douglas Adams
9cdc008b-d86e-414e-a2cc-4226499e0acb.description: Arthur Dent is swept off Earth just before it's destroyed to make way for a galactic freeway, embarking on a humorous and absurd adventure through space.

5a955e4f-d49c-4ce8-a839-2737fc2c1e1a.author: George Orwell
5a955e4f-d49c-4ce8-a839-2737fc2c1e1a.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society under constant surveillance, where independent thinking is a crime.

c832b07d-704c-4a2c-ba0a-d76c10eba70f.title: Fahrenheit 451
c832b07d-704c-4a2c-ba0a-d76c10eba70f.author: Ray Bradbury
c832b07d-704c-4a2c-ba0a-d76c10eba70f.description: In a future where books are banned and 'firemen' burn any that are found, one fireman begins to question his role in society.

f4d89538-3036-4a99-acd5-62209d0e4b4f.title: The Martian
f4d89538-3036-4a99-acd5-62209d0e4b4f.author: Andy Weir
f4d89538-3036-4a99-acd5-62209d0e4b4f.description: Stranded on Mars, astronaut Mark Watney must use his ingenuity and spirit to survive and find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

8b4abea4-d7bf-4ff1-9bb6-6eead512901e.title: Neuromancer
8b4abea4-d7bf-4ff1-9bb6-6eead512901e.author: William Gibson
8b4abea4-d7bf-4ff1-9bb6-6eead512901e.description: A washed-up computer hacker is hired for one last job: to pull off the ultimate hack in a world of cybernetics and artificial intelligence.

b62a7f38-f1dd-4327-bb05-b11bd974a094.title: Treasure Island
b62a7f38-f1dd-4327-bb05-b11bd974a094.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
b62a7f38-f1dd-4327-bb05-b11bd974a094.description: A young boy named Jim Hawkins embarks on a perilous journey to find buried pirate treasure.

c361f2cd-a15d-44dc-8e30-3648176b19eb.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
c361f2cd-a15d-44dc-8e30-3648176b19eb.author: Alexandre Dumas
c361f2cd-a15d-44dc-8e30-3648176b19eb.description: Edmond Dant√®s is wrongfully imprisoned and escapes to seek revenge on those who betrayed him.

8323ac10-6bb4-4d69-93d1-9bac84174d5c.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
8323ac10-6bb4-4d69-93d1-9bac84174d5c.author: Jules Verne
8323ac10-6bb4-4d69-93d1-9bac84174d5c.description: Professor Lidenbrock and his nephew Axel embark on a subterranean adventure to the Earth's core.

ae355edf-94e1-4848-85a1-62a676512ae8.title: The Three Musketeers
ae355edf-94e1-4848-85a1-62a676512ae8.author: Alexandre Dumas
ae355edf-94e1-4848-85a1-62a676512ae8.description: D'Artagnan and his three musketeer friends fight for justice and honor in 17th-century France.

c768e061-43cd-4df7-aa84-3282b720dd8a.title: Moby-Dick
c768e061-43cd-4df7-aa84-3282b720dd8a.author: Herman Melville
c768e061-43cd-4df7-aa84-3282b720dd8a.description: Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to hunt the great white whale, Moby-Dick.

4f3a56b1-1954-4641-80f5-7d6f07fcd57c.title: The Lost World
4f3a56b1-1954-4641-80f5-7d6f07fcd57c.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
4f3a56b1-1954-4641-80f5-7d6f07fcd57c.description: Professor Challenger leads an expedition to a plateau in the Amazon basin where dinosaurs still roam.

50ab5fed-0798-4b76-a0fe-a9cb5db17b1a.title: Around the World in Eighty Days
50ab5fed-0798-4b76-a0fe-a9cb5db17b1a.author: Jules Verne
50ab5fed-0798-4b76-a0fe-a9cb5db17b1a.description: Phileas Fogg attempts to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days to win a bet.

cc421157-6f39-4348-918c-2e280e30d282.title: A Gentleman in Moscow
cc421157-6f39-4348-918c-2e280e30d282.author: Amor Towles
cc421157-6f39-4348-918c-2e280e30d282.description: A Russian aristocrat is sentenced to house arrest in a grand hotel across the street from the Kremlin.

65a0c03e-9bc0-4930-b58d-f71aa05461a8.title: The Book Thief
65a0c03e-9bc0-4930-b58d-f71aa05461a8.author: Markus Zusak
65a0c03e-9bc0-4930-b58d-f71aa05461a8.description: Narrated by Death, this novel is set in Nazi Germany and follows a young girl who steals books to share with others.

0e7331e2-aa60-4f17-85f3-20dbcda0398c.title: The Nightingale
0e7331e2-aa60-4f17-85f3-20dbcda0398c.author: Kristin Hannah
0e7331e2-aa60-4f17-85f3-20dbcda0398c.description: Two sisters in Nazi-occupied France: one who joins the Resistance, and one who tries to survive the war at home.

28e70445-832f-484d-8c71-440e4341f90d.title: All the Light We Cannot See
28e70445-832f-484d-8c71-440e4341f90d.author: Anthony Doerr
28e70445-832f-484d-8c71-440e4341f90d.description: A blind French girl and a German boy whose paths collide in occupied France as both try to survive the devastation of World War II.

c528c74a-15f9-4c6b-9016-968a3a1b6013.title: The Pillars of the Earth
c528c74a-15f9-4c6b-9016-968a3a1b6013.author: Ken Follett
c528c74a-15f9-4c6b-9016-968a3a1b6013.description: Set in 12th-century England, this epic tale follows the construction of a cathedral and the lives of the people connected to it.

6e347a50-1681-4a2c-aff1-a5a32707e1fd.title: The Tattooist of Auschwitz
6e347a50-1681-4a2c-aff1-a5a32707e1fd.author: Heather Morris
6e347a50-1681-4a2c-aff1-a5a32707e1fd.description: Based on the true story of Lale Sokolov, a Jewish man who is forced to tattoo numbers on his fellow prisoners in Auschwitz.

2485bb21-d493-41a8-8e86-a8bce441f37b.title: The Silent Patient
2485bb21-d493-41a8-8e86-a8bce441f37b.author: Alex Michaelides
2485bb21-d493-41a8-8e86-a8bce441f37b.description: A woman shoots her husband and then stops speaking. A psychotherapist is determined to get her to talk and uncover the truth.

2d1db1fd-67cb-42b9-96cb-6853d8549f42.title: Gone Girl
2d1db1fd-67cb-42b9-96cb-6853d8549f42.author: Gillian Flynn
2d1db1fd-67cb-42b9-96cb-6853d8549f42.description: On their fifth wedding anniversary, Nick's wife Amy disappears. Under pressure from the police and a growing media frenzy, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble.

d77f96d1-ae8a-4846-8e0c-94ebae151f44.title: The Girl on the Train
d77f96d1-ae8a-4846-8e0c-94ebae151f44.author: Paula Hawkins
d77f96d1-ae8a-4846-8e0c-94ebae151f44.description: Rachel catches the same commuter train every morning. One day, she sees something shocking. Now Rachel has a chance to become a part of the lives she's only watched from afar.

21dde114-a329-459a-b254-7ab3d9b6a404.title: The Woman in the Window
21dde114-a329-459a-b254-7ab3d9b6a404.author: A.J. Finn
21dde114-a329-459a-b254-7ab3d9b6a404.description: An agoraphobic woman believes she witnessed a crime in a neighboring house, but no one believes her.

fdeb115f-7fa1-4055-9f50-64203c489a1e.title: The Da Vinci Code
fdeb115f-7fa1-4055-9f50-64203c489a1e.author: Dan Brown
fdeb115f-7fa1-4055-9f50-64203c489a1e.description: A murder in the Louvre and clues in Da Vinci paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years.

669a4739-17cc-417c-91d5-76b04b3a5725.title: Big Little Lies
669a4739-17cc-417c-91d5-76b04b3a5725.author: Liane Moriarty
669a4739-17cc-417c-91d5-76b04b3a5725.description: A murder...a tragic accident...or just parents behaving badly? What's indisputable is that someone is dead.

43d983a2-df10-4c8d-a2b1-3e0e8179e8b0.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
43d983a2-df10-4c8d-a2b1-3e0e8179e8b0.author: Stieg Larsson
43d983a2-df10-4c8d-a2b1-3e0e8179e8b0.description: A journalist and a hacker team up to solve a decades-old disappearance in Sweden.

f74d6955-4b87-424e-a7cd-e40823ea493a.title: Maus
f74d6955-4b87-424e-a7cd-e40823ea493a.author: Art Spiegelman
f74d6955-4b87-424e-a7cd-e40823ea493a.description: A Holocaust survivor's tale told through the lens of anthropomorphic animals.

d4d8c10f-3b88-40b6-9916-faebba77b799.title: Persepolis
d4d8c10f-3b88-40b6-9916-faebba77b799.author: Marjane Satrapi
d4d8c10f-3b88-40b6-9916-faebba77b799.description: An autobiographical graphic novel depicting the author's childhood in Iran during and after the Islamic Revolution.

4145a47d-94da-4176-9a13-28feca654e6d.title: Watchmen
4145a47d-94da-4176-9a13-28feca654e6d.author: Alan Moore, Dave Gibbons
4145a47d-94da-4176-9a13-28feca654e6d.description: A complex, multi-layered narrative that deconstructs the superhero genre.

cb30a99e-d6de-4afe-b363-2c23cd35c60e.title: Sandman
cb30a99e-d6de-4afe-b363-2c23cd35c60e.author: Neil Gaiman
cb30a99e-d6de-4afe-b363-2c23cd35c60e.description: A dark fantasy series that blends mythology, history, and literature.

b9eda2d3-26d5-4821-9f86-efa31fdbcf1b.title: Fun Home
b9eda2d3-26d5-4821-9f86-efa31fdbcf1b.author: Alison Bechdel
b9eda2d3-26d5-4821-9f86-efa31fdbcf1b.description: A memoir about the author's relationship with her father and her coming out as a lesbian.

4ccffef9-b1a1-4286-bab4-6a8853bbf3bf.title: Saga
4ccffef9-b1a1-4286-bab4-6a8853bbf3bf.author: Brian K. Vaughan, Fiona Staples
4ccffef9-b1a1-4286-bab4-6a8853bbf3bf.description: An epic space opera/fantasy series about a family fighting to survive in a war-torn galaxy.

c9eeffd7-a1d5-4c88-9fec-bdcfa081019d.title: Blankets
c9eeffd7-a1d5-4c88-9fec-bdcfa081019d.author: Craig Thompson
c9eeffd7-a1d5-4c88-9fec-bdcfa081019d.description: A coming-of-age story about first love, family, and faith.

95a29193-7a89-491d-8dcf-ab84790d7358.title: The Hobbit
95a29193-7a89-491d-8dcf-ab84790d7358.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
95a29193-7a89-491d-8dcf-ab84790d7358.description: Bilbo Baggins embarks on an unexpected journey to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home.

af299846-adae-413e-8fbd-29b3380f0deb.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
af299846-adae-413e-8fbd-29b3380f0deb.author: J.K. Rowling
af299846-adae-413e-8fbd-29b3380f0deb.description: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

fabcb43d-41bc-4ecc-8076-63f051b39fb6.title: The Name of the Wind
fabcb43d-41bc-4ecc-8076-63f051b39fb6.author: Patrick Rothfuss
fabcb43d-41bc-4ecc-8076-63f051b39fb6.description: The story of a magically gifted young man who grows up to become a legendary figure.

4aadd70e-e9bf-49ae-b82f-cccc6d5c7845.title: Mistborn: The Final Empire
4aadd70e-e9bf-49ae-b82f-cccc6d5c7845.author: Brandon Sanderson
4aadd70e-e9bf-49ae-b82f-cccc6d5c7845.description: A young street urchin discovers she has the powers of a Mistborn and joins a group of rebels to overthrow the oppressive Lord Ruler.

a1b8fbf3-2cc0-499e-aaac-5ae84fc8c401.title: The Way of Kings
a1b8fbf3-2cc0-499e-aaac-5ae84fc8c401.author: Brandon Sanderson
a1b8fbf3-2cc0-499e-aaac-5ae84fc8c401.description: An epic tale of war, politics, and magic in a world where storms shape the landscape and the fate of nations.

315f17b2-d690-4501-ac83-bbdd58b5ca8f.title: The Lies of Locke Lamora
315f17b2-d690-4501-ac83-bbdd58b5ca8f.author: Scott Lynch
315f17b2-d690-4501-ac83-bbdd58b5ca8f.description: A young orphan grows up to become a master thief in a city of canals and thieves.

d82ffb6e-f478-4c7a-91e1-7f03456d58ff.title: The Priory of the Orange Tree
d82ffb6e-f478-4c7a-91e1-7f03456d58ff.author: Samantha Shannon
d82ffb6e-f478-4c7a-91e1-7f03456d58ff.description: A world divided by a thousand-year-old war must come together to face an ancient dragon.
